p: The effect of soilless media and fertigation regime on mesembrine concentrations in the root of S. tortuosum was statistically significant at the value of p ≤ 0.001. At p ≤ 0.001, the highest mesembrine concentration of (1.14) was recorded in the SC medium under fertigation regime 2 (FR2) while the least value (0.10) was observed in SV medium under fertigation regime 4 (FR4).
